sentences.cn: 焦虑乃是人的本能趋于紊乱.

sentences.en: But again, Haywire just quietly stares at him.
sentences.cn: 但是, Haywire又一次静静地凝视着他.

sentences.en: Haywire : Are you the guy who stole my toothpaste?
sentences.cn: 你是那个偷我牙膏的人?

sentences.en: Haywire: I got a neuroanatomic lesion affecting my reticular activating system.
sentences.cn: 我有神经管能上的损伤,影响了我的网状活化系统.

sentences.en: He is haywire to say that.
Michael raises his hand and snaps his fingers in Haywire's face to make him focus.
sentences.cn: Michael举起手来,在Haywire面前打个响指使得他精神集中在他身上.

sentences.en: Michael tells Haywire he needs him to remember what he drew.
sentences.cn: Michael告诉Haywire, 他需要他回忆起他所画的图案.

sentences.en: The computer opposes me. Everything goes haywire when I use it.
sentences.cn: 计算机与我作对. 我每次我一用它,它就乱了套.

sentences.en: The simplest home - related activities can go haywire during a Mercury retrograde period.
sentences.cn: 甚至是最简单的家务事在水星逆行期间都会很难缠的.

sentences.en: Things go haywire, people reverse their decisions, flaws show up in documents, and shipments arrive broken.
sentences.cn: 事情变得棘手, 人们改变决定, 文件出现错误, 以及货物损坏.

sentences.en: Things just very rarely go haywire now.
sentences.cn: 现在已经很难天下大乱了.

sentences.en: When the natural stress response goes haywire.
sentences.cn: 当自然压力反应出了毛病.

words.tran_cn: 干草机；制作干草的人；强力一击
乡巴佬；干草种子，干草屑
乱糟糟的，乱七八糟的；疯狂的

trans.tran_cn: [电] 临时电线；捆干草用的铁丝
